ygData.subject: Re: armor
ygData.msgSnippet: You can get some woven armor or damask... we pretty much have to stick to cloth types but they are much better for certain.  I think we are able to wear netted
ygData.messageBody:
You can get some woven armor or damask... we pretty much have to stick to
cloth types but they are much better for certain. I think we are able to
wear netted too.. I have a netted item I believe, can't say what it is
offhand right now since I'm not in game looking at it. I have gotten
damask wrist items in najena.. I believe you can get some in befallen
maybe?? People will have to correct me, I haven't been out looking for this
stuff specifically yet.


At 09:09 PM 6/24/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: robert boensch <ideoit@...>
>
>hi im level 10 and im looking for some woven armor does anyone know
>where i can get some? or any other type of armor that is better then
>cloth. i currently reside in qeynos.
>-thanks id
>cazic-thule
